str2: Confidence, trust, reliance. From the perfect of the alternate of pascho; reliance.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: To will, intend, desire, wish. Middle voice of a primary verb; to 'will, ' i.e. be willing.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Formerly, before. Neuter of proteros as adverb; previously.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Second; with the article: in the second place, for the second time. As the compare of duo; second.
From chairo; graciousness, of manner or act.
